languages.text: "А вдруг их цель на самом деле просто мучить людей? В таком случае механизмам Администратума нет равных!"
"What if their goal is really just to torture people? In that case, the Administratum's methods would give the Inquisition a run for its money!"
languages.original_text: "А вдруг их цель на самом деле просто мучить людей? В таком случае механизмам Администратума нет равных!"

traits.locale_text: "What if their goal is really just to torture people? In that case, the Administratum's methods would give the Inquisition a run for its money!"

languages.text: “如果他们的目标真的只是想折磨别人呢？如果真是这样，那我得说，内政部的手段可以和审判庭一较高低！”
languages.original_text: "What if their goal is really just to torture people? In that case, the Administratum's methods would give the Inquisition a run for its money!"

traits.locale_text: “如果他们的目标真的只是想折磨别人呢？如果真是这样，那我得说，内政部的手段可以和审判庭一较高低！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Et si leur but, c'était juste de torturer les gens ? Si c'est le cas, l'Inquisition devrait en prendre de la graine ! »
languages.original_text: "What if their goal is really just to torture people? In that case, the Administratum's methods would give the Inquisition a run for its money!"

traits.locale_text: « Et si leur but, c'était juste de torturer les gens ? Si c'est le cas, l'Inquisition devrait en prendre de la graine ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¿Y si su objetivo es torturar a la gente? ¡En ese caso, los métodos del Administratum están a la altura de los de la Inquisición!».
languages.original_text: "What if their goal is really just to torture people? In that case, the Administratum's methods would give the Inquisition a run for its money!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y si su objetivo es torturar a la gente? ¡En ese caso, los métodos del Administratum están a la altura de los de la Inquisición!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「行政局の目的が、実はただ人々を拷問にかけたいだけだとしたら？それなら、行政局のやり口は異端審問庁といい勝負ね！」
languages.original_text: "What if their goal is really just to torture people? In that case, the Administratum's methods would give the Inquisition a run for its money!"

traits.locale_text: 「行政局の目的が、実はただ人々を拷問にかけたいだけだとしたら？それなら、行政局のやり口は異端審問庁といい勝負ね！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Und wenn ihr Ziel in Wahrheit nur ist, Menschen zu foltern? Dann können die Methoden des Administratums mühelos mit denen der Inquisition mithalten!"
languages.original_text: "What if their goal is really just to torture people? In that case, the Administratum's methods would give the Inquisition a run for its money!"

languages.original_text: "What if their goal is really just to torture people? In that case, the Administratum's methods would give the Inquisition a run for its money!"

languages.text: "Ya amaçları gerçekten sadece insanlara işkence etmekse? Öyleyse Administratum'un usulleri, Engizisyon'unkilere kök söktürebilir!"
